data.text: Thanks @IamDonCheadle & @MichaelFranti for taking part in today's #EnvisionFilm event & supporting the #futurewewant! http://t.co/siGuSwYu
Documentaries can change the world:  #EnvisionFilm live stream starts soon here: http://t.co/yXbYP78Y #FutureWeWant
How can we achieve the #FutureWeWant? Join @HelenClarkUNDP for her latest #UNDPchat at 15h in London. Follow @UNDP for details.
Special Representative on Sexual Violence in Conflict @MargotWallstrom to step down at the end of May http://t.co/Psr4awaN
#Syria: #HumanRights team welcomes arrival of UN observers, concern over arrests: http://t.co/ZM1q87fx http://t.co/K2V0Xliw
@MsJohnsonSTS For #climatechange updates, follow @CFigueres, @ipcc_ch, @UN_ClimateTalks & @Connect4Climate.  Good luck to your students!
@BellaBehold Don't think so. Hope our @wfp colleagues in Rome can answer for sure.
Ban Ki-moon welcomes @European_Union #energy4all initiative for developing countries http://t.co/W9Qzihvy #Futurewewant
@BIG_MONDE Find some ideas here: http://t.co/4epi01V2. Also follow @WeCanEndPoverty, @UNESCOnow & @UNGEI for updates.
@HazaraKilling Follow @UNRightswire & @UN_HRC for #humanrights updates.

Today in NYC! #EnvisionFilm event focuses on the #FutureWeWant -- stories for a sustainable future: http://t.co/siGuSwYu
New market-syle delivery system improves the distribution of supplies to displaced families in DR Congo http://t.co/GrQOjV7B #DRC
@ReY0902 Thanks for the support!
The @UNPeacekeeping 2011 Year in Review publication is here! Take a look at what was accomplished: http://t.co/d7Vl0huQ
We posted a Spring at UNHQ photo & got responses from Oman, DR Congo, Brazil, Belgium, India & more. See: http://t.co/4JH9UGG9
@AlbaEspino7 Please do. Some would argue this is the most important one: http://t.co/gjYBV0Ec
@AlbaEspino7 Do you have more info about the resolution? You can reply here or email to unreference@un.org.
In case you missed it, one of the week's highlights was when Ban Ki-moon spoke to young people online, Watch: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz
Latest @UNICEF #SahelNOW video breaks down the effects of malnutrition on children: http://t.co/NE7dU6A5
What's the weather like where you live? Here in NYC, it's Spring at UN Headquarters. Photo: http://t.co/QYxg29gF #UN
Meet @WFP's new Executive Director Ertharin Cousin who began her new assignment last week: http://t.co/Z5hKP6Xz
Watch a special message direct from the International Space Station to young people visiting the UN last week: http://t.co/JxveJy0h
#Titanic reminds us that new generations of vessels bring new challenges. Photos from @IMOHQ on safe shipping: http://t.co/2b7YSAOh
What is it like being a young person in the #MiddleEast & #NorthAfrica? Video from @UNICEFmena http://t.co/K6ORdOMm via @UNPYouth
See why Arun #Gandhi, grandson of Mahatma Gandhi, is teaching nonviolence in #Haiti: http://t.co/FrXHYnHv via @MINUSTAHMedia
Indonesia quake: @UNESCOnow's Indian Ocean Tsunami Warning System performed well, detailed assessment underway http://t.co/SOiSHYG7
Syria: Security Council authorizes deployment of advance military observer team http://t.co/GOACp6By | Resolution: http://t.co/uqvs19vU
Did you know the UN's Maritime Organization (@IMOHQ) can trace its own roots back to the Titanic disaster? More here: http://t.co/ZjqK0dcE
Ban Ki-moon & @KofiAnnan welcome  Security Council authorization of advance team of UN observers to Syria http://t.co/CuRMj67X
Saturday: UN Security Council adopted resolution on #Syria unanimously. Text of resolution 2042 to be posted soon.
Syria: UN Security Council members expected to vote on resolution this morning. Watch live here: http://t.co/B3alNFjC
New @worldbank #openaccess repository makes 1000s of works available under @creativecommons CC BY license http://t.co/wfkq3Vqe
@50WomenProject Glad to hear it. Follow @UN_Women & @WeCanEndPoverty for related updates, too!
UN envoy speaks out against reported child soldier recruitment in northern Mali http://t.co/BAwQLm5W
#GuineaBissau: Ban Ki-moon & Security Council strongly condemn forceful seizure of power http://t.co/atctUtoh
In these new videos, astronauts, cosmonauts, scientists & writers explain why people should care about space:  http://t.co/JxveJy0h
India: #humanrights expert hails Indian court decision to uphold right of every child to education http://t.co/UCaiIqOF
This week Ban Ki-moon highlighted rock band @LinkinPark's commitment to #energy4all. Watch: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz #futurewewant
100 years ago this week the Titanic sank. What impact did it have on maritime safety? This @IMOHQ video explains: http://t.co/VIBdLFlo
Going green -- 1st "paper smart" UN Chief Executives Board Meeting hosted by @ITU_News & @WMOnews on Friday http://t.co/XPX8jPYu

@sarangtarare Hopefully next time! Thanks for your interest!
DPRK: Despite its failure, Ban Ki-moon says launch violates Security Council Res 1874 & threatens regional stability http://t.co/HcI0DS95
Mali: fighting in northern Mali has sent thousands fleeing south to find safety. Video from @Refugees: http://t.co/lESph3AQ
Ban Ki-moon chatted online w/ young people from Sri Lanka, Kenya, Brazil, UK & US this week. See what happened here: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz
Listen to an interview with @BriceLalonde, #RioPlus20 conference Executive Coordinator on the #futurewewant: http://t.co/geD4qlkl
High-level UN group launched this week aims to help countries improve nutrition. Find out more: http://t.co/y6zTjfcT

18 years after the genocide, see how Rwandans are learning from history to shape a brighter future http://t.co/1KBAdJZ1 #neverforget
Watch now: Sergey Krikalev, who holds record for longest time spent in space, takes part in Space Flight Day event: http://t.co/B3alNFjC
Special guests at UNHQ today include @NASA's Charles Bolden, singer-songwriter @BNCmusic, rocket scientists & more: http://t.co/MfudXmlM
51 years ago today -- Yuri Gagarin became 1st human in outer space. More on why the UN marks this day: http://t.co/IkWFWXNu
Learning from Rwanda genocide only way to shape a better future, says Ban Ki-moon http://t.co/wclOWmJX #neverforget
Photo from Geneva: Exhibit on Rwandan genocide now on display http://t.co/GVFOomcW. More info here: http://t.co/6oPFaEtV #neverforget
@darkenator Thanks! Hope you like the photos & videos we post there.
Thursday: Intl Day of Human Space Flight honours role of space science & technology for peaceful purposes. More:  http://t.co/IkWFWXNu
Young people deserve to get info, connect & ask questions -- so Ban Ki-moon took their questions online! Watch: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz
@srazikazmi That was for the live event which already took place. Watch the recording here: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz. Thanks!
@MUGiSA3000 We'll ask and let you know. Thanks for your interest!
@SamuelGEllis Glad to hear it.
@knmiso That was for the live event which already took place. Watch the recording here: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz. Thanks!

@JuliaPanayiotou Thanks for catching that and mentioning our @WeCanEndPoverty colleagues!
@AlexandraNiall You may be interested in this: http://t.co/l5KJyyv9. See also: http://t.co/wqRXIqDf
@Dianne93101 There is no way to "sign up" to it, it's a binding resolution for all Member States, see: http://t.co/hHot5x9A
@undp_kenya Thanks for the post! Glad to have two Kenyans take part!
@ShekeelaJones You may be interested in the fact on this website: http://t.co/2jhzgbLu #Haiti

@EmilieRosa Glad you enjoyed your visit!
@MsDelalinda Kindly see: http://t.co/tUvSuGHD
@debbie101253 Find out how the UN delivers results here: http://t.co/RtEbwGik
@waxmerchant Thanks for your comments. We're a small team & we think photos & videos stand for themselves. Keep following for improvements!
@flaviodantas Glad to hear from you!
@Donasherenas If we do more events, you're welcome to apply to take part. Also follow @UNIC_Jakarta if you're not already doing so. Thanks!
Ban Ki-moon chatted online w/ young people from Sri Lanka, Kenya, Brazil, UK & US yesterday. See what happened here: http://t.co/XcGcd6Xz
Young journalist? Blogger? Win a chance to cover @ILOnews #YouthEmployment Forum on 23-25 May! Find out how: http://t.co/sjQRShtr
How is @UNICEF prepared to handle the #Sahel #foodcrisis? Watch this: http://t.co/fWKFutg5 #SahelNOW
Interview with John Ging, @UNOCHA Director of Operations, on humanitarian crisis in the Sahel http://t.co/oPGjk6y9 #SahelNOW
We've posted more behind-the-scenes photos from Tuesday's #GooglePlus hangout wtih Ban Ki-moon here: http://t.co/D0R95cgm
That’s it! Thanks to all participants & to all tuning in to watch Ban Ki-moon’s #GooglePlus hangout! We’ll post the full recording here soon
Participant from Sri Lanka wants to know what role young people can play in deciding the #futurewewant http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
David Drummond from @Google asks question about internet freedom.
Next question from the US is on using the internet to promote #humanrights http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
Ban Ki-moon is now taking a question from Kenya on discrimination & terrorism http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
The 3rd question is from the UK, on entrepreneurship, technology & youth unemployment. http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
2nd question from Kenya is on involving women & youth in decision making processes http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
The 1st question is from Brazil – What steps can intl community take to eradicate poverty? http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
Thank you to David Drummond who’s moderating today from @Google HQ in Mountain View, California. http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
Ban Ki-moon is here! #GooglePlus hangout with young people starts now. Watch here: http://t.co/YLj4CQPb
